findings.title: RV - Redundant Variables
findings.description: Code segments can be optimized, and redundant variables can be removed to improve efficiency and performance.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables initialized in the constructor should be declared as immutable for gas efficiency and storage reduction.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant to ensure their values cannot be changed and reduce gas consumption.
findings.location: Papi Pepe contract, multiple state variables

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity naming conventions, making it difficult to read and maintain.
findings.location: Papi Pepe contract, multiple functions and variables

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code should be removed to improve code clarity, reduce deployment costs, and avoid potential issues.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables set with user-supplied input lack proper zero-value checks, leading to potential problems during contract execution.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The compiler version should be locked to ensure stability and avoid potential issues with unexpected versions.

findings.title: L22 - Potential Locked Ether
findings.description: Ether may become locked in the contract, causing financial losses for users who called the payable method.
